net.cnri.repository.internal

Class InternalRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.AbstractRepository
      • net.cnri.repository.networked.NetworkedRepository
        • net.cnri.repository.internal.InternalRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository

    public class InternalRepository
extends NetworkedRepository
    A repository interface to the server we are running within. For use within servlets running in a repository server. Example use: 
        Repository repo = new InternalRepository(serverMain,new SimpleAuthenticatedCaller(serverMain.getServerID()));
    will connect to the server authenticated as the server itself (and thus will be authorized to do everything).
    See Also:
    SimpleAuthenticatedCaller
